issue.title: [R] Fix guard around dataset___Scanner__TakeRows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12401](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12401). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-11797 / [#9589](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9589) wrapped a Dataset-dependent function definition in `#if defined(ARROW_R_WITH_ARROW)`  instead of `#if defined(ARROW_R_WITH_DATASET)`, causing R minimal builds to fail

<https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/d575858e8ff847e8d4e7b6c121e8041cbe2b93c2#diff-f6ded32632f8b1516f0e852b8e648af02be39e60010c546a17502d1830245076R2085>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12401?focusedCommentId=17322354) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10051
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10051>
